data.name: email2_body
data.value:
Hail {0}!


A friend whose invitation you accepted when registering, has claimed their reward of you reaching a title of Knight! As a thank you for your dedication, please accept a small gift of 5 servants as well.


Did you know that you can also claim rewards for recruiting other Knights into the game? Please click here for details.


Once again, Congratulations on your progress!


This is an automated message, please do not reply

data.name: email2_subject
data.value: Please accept this gift of 5 servants!

data.name: email_AttackIn_Body
data.value:
{0} {1}. You are under attack in Realm of Empires!

First attack landing at {2} local time. Defend yourself!

Note, you will not receive further alerts from this realm until you login to the realm, even if a new attack, landing earlier than this one, is launched.

data.name: email_AttackIn_Subject
data.value: You are under attack in Realm of Empires, {0}

data.name: email_BPEnding_Body
data.value:
{0} {1}, your Beginner Protection runs out in just {2} hours!

What does this mean? This means you will be vulnerable to attacks. Other players will be able to attack you to loot your silver, destroy your buildings or even take your hard-earned city from you!.

Login now!

Here are some tips how you can protect yourself:
> Join a good clan
> Recruit troops. Infantry is a good choice for defense
> Build Wall and Towers
> Build Hiding Spot to hide your silver in case of an attack
> Be active! no one wants to pick an even fight :)

data.name: email_BPEnding_Subject
data.value: Are you ready? Wars may begin in {0} hours

data.name: email_ClanInvite_Body
data.value:
Hey {3} {4}!

I just invited you to my clan {0} in Realm Of Empires!

Hope to see you there! Cheers!
{1} {2}

Accept or Reject the invitation.

Clan is a loose federation of players working together for their mutual glory! Invites expire so decide soon!

data.name: email_ClanInvite_Subject
data.value: {0} {1} invited you to a clan

data.name: email_footer
data.value:
This is an automated player alert from the Facebook game Realm Of Empires; please do not reply
You are receiving this email beacuse you authorized Realm of Empires in facebook.

If you do not want to receive such alerts, you can turn off email notifications. Login and go to Tools & Options -> Options where you can turn off emails from us.


To ensure you do not miss such an alert, please add the sender of this message (PlayerAlerts @ RealmOfEmpires.com) to your safe sender list.

data.name: email_header
email_Inactive_Body
data.value:
Hello {0} {1},

This is a notification that you have been inactive for at least 7 days on {2}.

Players that are inactive for 14 days are removed from the realm - they lose all their villages which go "abandoned" and can fall into enemies' hands.

To prevent going abandoned, please make sure you login to {2}.

What if I am on vacation?
Make sure you assign a kingdom steward - another player whom you trust, perhaps a clanmate - that will look after your kingdom during your absence. Player with active stewards do not go abandoned.

What if I don't play on {2} anymore?
If you choose not to play on {2} anymore, then you can safely ignore this message and your village(s) will simply go abandoned. There is nothing you need to do in this case.

data.name: email_Inactive_Subject
data.value: Your kingdom is about to be abandoned

data.name: email_EmailNotify_Body
data.value:
Hello {0} {1},

This is a notification that you received an email from {3} on {2}

Subject:{4}
Message:{5} ...
You currently have {6} unread messages on {2}. Login to check your messages

Note, you will not receive further alerts from this realm about new emails until you login to the realm.

data.name: email_EmailNotify_Subject
data.value: Email from {0} : '{1}'

data.name: email_youHaveBeenBlocked_body
data.value:
This is a courtesy information email, telling you that you have been blocked by another player.
This email does not suggest that you did anything wrong, it just tells you that someone blocked you which MAY be a sign that someone found your communications offensive. Repeated blocks will flag you for investigation as we try to ensure that everyone is following the Terms of Use.
Violations of the TOU may result in a suspension or ban from communication channels, the realm, or RoE itself. The TOU can be found here: https://www.realmofempires.com/tou.aspx
Again, there is absolutely no cause for concern if you have not broken any rules and this email can be safely disregarded and note that we warn players first if rules are broken, unless of a serious (criminal) offense. If you have any questions, please feel free to contact support at anytime.
Have fun and play hard - but be respectful of your fellow players.
-RoE Team
This is an automated email, from a unmonitored mailbox, please do not reply

data.name: email_youHaveBeenBlocked_subject
data.value: You have been blocked by another player

data.name: email_verifyrecoveryemailsubject
data.value: Realm of Empires recovery email verification.

data.name: email_verifyrecoveryemailbody
data.value:
Hi {0} from {1},

Please confirm your email address by clicking here.

If you did not register for a new account or did not request an email change please ignore this email.

Sincerely,
The Realm of Empires Team.

data.name: email_verifyrecoveryemail_footer
data.value:
You are receiving this automated alert because you play Realm Of Empires - please do not reply. Email notifications can be turned off for each realm individually.
To ensure you do not miss such an alert, please add the sender of this message (PlayerAlerts @ RealmOfEmpires.com) to your safe sender list. [[%MIXPANELPIXEL%]]

data.name: email_verifyrecoveraccountbody
data.value:
PLEASE READ THE FOLLOWING CAREFULLY AND ONLY COMPLETE THIS IF IT IS CORRECT.

Someone (maybe you) has requested to recover their account associated with this email.

If this was not you, then just delete and ignore this email - no further action from your end is necessary. Your account is safe.

For your reference, the account that is associated with this email address has the following player(s): {0}.

If it is you who requested to recover this account, and want to associate it with your new device, then please click here to verify and accept this change. (expires in 48 hours)

if this is not the account that you want to recover, then remember that you may get multiple recovery emails, one for each account associated with this email address. Please use the right email to recover the correct account and ignore the others.

Again, if this email was not initiated by you, delete and ignore this email.

If you have any questions, please contact us as support@realmofempires.com

Sincerely,
The Realm of Empires Team.

data.name: email_verifyrecoveraccountsubject
data.value: Realm of Empires account email verification for the following player(s): {0}

data.name: email_verifyrecoveraccountbodyforfb
data.value:
PLEASE READ THE FOLLOWING CAREFULLY.

Someone (maybe you) has requested to recover their account associated with this email. However this account is a FACEBOOK account. Please go back to Realm of Empires and tap 'I DID THAT, NOW LOG ME IN' or just login with 'VIA FACEBOOK'.

If this was not you, then just delete and ignore this email - no further action from your end is necessary. Your account is safe.

For your reference, the account that is associated with this email address has the following player(s): {0}.

Again, if this email was not initiated by you, delete and ignore this email.

If you have any questions, please contact us as support@realmofempires.com

Sincerely,
The Realm of Empires Team.

data.name: email_verifyemail_onregistration_body
data.value:
Welcome to Realm of Empires!

Thank you for registering

Please click here to verify your email. This is necessary to secure your Tactica Account.

Let the battles begin!

Sincerely,
The Realm of Empires Team.

P.S. If you did not create a Tactica account, please ignore and delete this email.

data.name: email_verifyemail_onregistration_subject
data.value: Welcome to Realm of Empires. Email verification required for security.

data.name: email_resetpassword_body
data.value:
Hello!,

You have requested to reset the password of your Realm of Empires Tactica account.

Please click on the following link to reset your password: {0}.

If you did not request this password reset, please ignore and delete this email, your account is safe.

Sincerely,
The Realm of Empires Team.

data.name: email_resetpassword_footer
data.value:
This is an automated player alert from the Facebook game Realm Of Empires; please do not reply
To ensure you do not miss such an alert, please add the sender of this message (PlayerAlerts @ RealmOfEmpires.com) to your safe sender list.

data.name: email_resetpasswordDone_body
data.value:
Hello!,

You have requested to reset the password of your Realm of Empires Tactica account.

Your new, randomly generated password is
{0}


Please go to your settings in-game and change this password as soon as possible. If you did not request this reset, please contact support at support@RealmOfEmpires.com

Sincerely,
The Realm of Empires Team.

data.name: email_resetpasswordDone_subject
data.value: Your password has been reset

data.name: email_resetpassword_subject
data.value: Reset Password
